description: Hello Paul, Welcome to QSTN, here we will introduce you to the platform. In this example, we will introduce you to web3 to begin earning $ANSR.
First, do you have a NEAR wallet? If so, connect it in the top right. Near is a L1 layer blockchain which we use to keep track of responses. Not reauired but allows true authorship of data.
Second, do you want to contribute anonymously? This will lower your rate and require you to create another username. We use NEAR Personas to create another wallet for anonymous users.
Third, if you look in the top right, for each question you answer; your balance increases by one. Do you see the '2' points from answering previously?
Fourth, what is your experience with cryptocurrencies on a scale of 1-10?
Fifth, please check all the cryptocurrencies you currently own
How easy was that? By now you should have earned 5 ANSR in your balance (Top Right). Everyday, we will load new questions in the EARN portal for you to earn.
For the final step, please click below to confirm your NEAR wallet. This is where you will eventually store the ANSR credit and NFTs when transferrable.
